files.README.md:
# Claude Code Plugins

Community plugins for [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code) by [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir).

## Installation

Start a new Claude Code session in the terminal and enter the following commands:

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install <plugin-name>
```

Restart Claude Code to activate the plugin.

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| [strategic-compact](#strategic-compact) | Smart context management with phase-aware compaction |
| [serena-integration](#serena-integration) | Full-automation Serena MCP integration |
| [dart-lsp](#dart-lsp) | Dart/Flutter language server integration |
| [pre-commit-flow](#pre-commit-flow) | Automated code review, docs, and commits |
| [idea-research](#idea-research) | Business research and idea validation |
| [implementation-planner](#implementation-planner) | Structured implementation planning with TDD |
| [project-optimizer](#project-optimizer) | Project setup, brand guidelines, CLAUDE.md generation |

---

## Strategic Compact

Smart context management that suggests compaction at strategic points instead of arbitrary auto-compaction.

### Features

- **Phase Detection**: Suggests compact when switching from exploration to implementation
- **Milestone Detection**: Detects test passes, commits, builds, deploys
- **Configurable Thresholds**: Control when suggestions appear
- **Compaction Guidance**: Preserves important context during compaction

### Installation

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install strategic-compact
```

### Configuration

```bash
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T1=50   # First suggestion (default: 50 tool calls)
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T2=75   # Second suggestion
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T3=100  # Strong recommendation
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_TIME=1800  # Time threshold (30 min default)
```

[Full documentation](./strategic-compact/README.md)

---

## Serena Integration

Full-automation Serena MCP integration for Claude Code. Zero manual configuration - semantic navigation, memory management, and tool routing work automatically.

### Prerequisites

Before installing, set up Serena MCP in your project:

```bash
# 1. Add Serena MCP server
cd /path/to/your/project
claude mcp add serena -- uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena start-mcp-server --context claude-code --project $(pwd)

# 2. Create project configuration
uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena project create

# 3. Index project (for large codebases)
uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena project index
```

### Features

- **Automatic Tool Suggestions**: Context-aware recommendations for Serena's semantic tools
- **Memory Suggestions**: Prompts to update memory after commits, tests, discoveries
- **Session Tracking**: Tracks edits, commits, tests for session summaries
- **Context Preservation**: Reminds to save context before compaction

### Installation

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install serena-integration
```

### Skills

| Skill | Triggers |
|-------|----------|
| `/serena-navigator` | "navigate code", "find definition", "explore codebase" |
| `/serena-refactor` | "rename function", "refactor", "rename symbol" |
| `/serena-memory` | "save context", "load memories", "persist knowledge" |

[Full documentation](./serena-integration/README.md)

---

## Dart LSP

Dart/Flutter language server integration for enhanced code intelligence.

### Features

- Go-to-definition
- Find references
- Hover information
- Code analysis

### Installation

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install dart-lsp
```

[Full documentation](./dart-lsp/README.md)

---

## Pre-Commit Flow

Automated code review, documentation updates, and intelligent commits with stack-specific intelligence.

### Features

- **Code Review**: Security analysis, bug detection, quality checks
- **Documentation**: Auto-update inline docs (PHPDoc, DartDoc, JSDoc)
- **Smart Commits**: Auto-detect commit style, generate semantic messages
- **Multi-Stack**: Laravel, Flutter, Vue 2/3, Nuxt, TailwindCSS, Alpine.js

### Installation

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install pre-commit-flow
```

### Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/my_review` | Code review with security analysis |
| `/my_docs` | Update inline documentation |
| `/my_commit` | Generate smart commit message |
| `/my_send` | Full workflow: review → docs → commit |

[Full documentation](./pre-commit-flow/README.md)

---

## Idea Research

Comprehensive business research, market analysis, competitor intelligence, and idea validation.

### Features

- **Market Research**: TAM/SAM/SOM calculation, industry analysis
- **Competitor Analysis**: Profile 10-20 competitors with positioning
- **Trend Analysis**: Signal detection, timing assessment
- **Idea Validation**: 5-dimension scoring, SWOT analysis

### Installation

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install idea-research
```

### Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/my_research [topic] --quick` | Quick market overview |
| `/my_research [topic] --standard` | Standard competitor analysis |
| `/my_research [topic] --deep` | Deep idea validation |

[Full documentation](./idea-research/README.md)

---

## Implementation Planner

Structured implementation planning with TDD support. Breaks down features into testable increments.

### Features

- **Plan Mode**: Create detailed implementation plans with phases and tasks
- **TDD Workflow**: Test-driven development with RED-GREEN-REFACTOR cycle
- **Execution Mode**: Step-by-step implementation with progress tracking
- **Multi-Stack**: Laravel, Flutter, Vue/Nuxt support

### Installation

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install implementation-planner
```

### Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/my_plan` | Create implementation plan for a feature |
| `/my_tdd` | Start TDD workflow (write tests first) |
| `/my_execute` | Execute plan step by step |

[Full documentation](./implementation-planner/README.md)

---

## Project Optimizer

Optimize existing projects for Claude Code with intelligent setup, brand guidelines, and project documentation.

### Features

- **Project Brief**: Create non-technical project.md with identity and features
- **Brand Guidelines**: Platform-agnostic brand.md with 12 Jungian archetypes
- **CLAUDE.md Generation**: Optimized technical configuration
- **Audit**: Quality assessment with improvement recommendations

### Installation

```
> /plugin marketplace add anilcancakir/claude-code-plugins

> /plugin install project-optimizer
```

### Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/my_project` | Create project brief (project.md) |
| `/my_brand` | Create brand guidelines (brand.md) |
| `/my_setup` | Generate CLAUDE.md configuration |
| `/my_audit` | Audit setup files with quality report |

[Full documentation](./project-optimizer/README.md)

---

## Requirements

- Claude Code CLI
- `jq` (for JSON processing in hooks)
- For serena-integration: Serena MCP server configured
- For idea-research: Internet access for WebSearch/WebFetch

## Contributing

1. Fork the repository
2. Create your plugin folder with required structure
3. Add to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
4. Submit a pull request

### Plugin Structure

```
my-plugin/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json       # Required: name, version, description
├── agents/               # Subagent definitions
│   └── agent-name.md
├── hooks/
│   └── hooks.json        # Hook definitions
├── scripts/              # Shell scripts for hooks
├── skills/
│   └── skill-name/
│       ├── SKILL.md      # Skill definitions
│       └── references/   # Supporting documents
├── commands/
│   └── command-name.md   # Slash commands
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)
files.strategic-compact/README.md:
# Strategic Compact

Smart context management plugin for Claude Code. Suggests manual compaction at strategic points instead of relying on arbitrary auto-compaction.

## Overview

Auto-compaction triggers when context is full, often mid-task. This loses important context at the worst possible time. Strategic compaction gives you control by suggesting compaction at logical breakpoints.

## Features

- **Phase Transition Detection**: Suggests compact when switching from exploration to implementation
- **Milestone Detection**: Detects test passes, commits, builds, and deploys
- **Time-Based Suggestions**: Recommends compact after long sessions
- **Configurable Thresholds**: Customize suggestion frequency via environment variables
- **Enhanced Compaction**: Injects guidance to preserve important context

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin add anilcancakir/strategic-compact
```

## Configuration

### Environment Variables

| Variable | Default | Description |
|----------|---------|-------------|
| `STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T1` | 50 | First suggestion threshold |
| `STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T2` | 75 | Second suggestion threshold |
| `STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T3` | 100 | Strong recommendation threshold |
| `STRATEGIC_COMPACT_TIME` | 1800 | Time threshold in seconds (30 min) |

### Examples

**Conservative (fewer suggestions):**
```bash
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T1=75
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T2=100
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T3=150
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_TIME=3600
```

**Aggressive (more suggestions):**
```bash
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T1=30
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T2=50
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_T3=75
export STRATEGIC_COMPACT_TIME=900
```

## How It Works

```
Session Start
     │
     ├──► Initialize tracking (tool counts, timestamps)
     │
     ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  EXPLORATION PHASE                                  │
│  (Read, Grep, Glob, WebSearch, Task)                │
│                                                     │
│  [10+ exploration calls, then Edit/Write]           │
│  → Phase transition suggestion                      │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
     │
     ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  IMPLEMENTATION PHASE                               │
│  (Edit, Write, Bash)                                │
│                                                     │
│  [T1 calls] → Checkpoint suggestion                 │
│  [T2 calls] → Context filling up                    │
│  [T3 calls] → Strong recommendation                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
     │
     ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  MILESTONE DETECTION                                │
│                                                     │
│  • Tests pass → "Milestone reached"                 │
│  • Git commit → "Code committed"                    │
│  • Build done → "Build completed"                   │
│  • Deploy → "Deployment complete"                   │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## Hooks

| Event | Script | Purpose |
|-------|--------|---------|
| `SessionStart` | session-init.sh | Initialize tracking state |
| `PreToolUse` | track-and-suggest.sh | Track tool usage, suggest compact |
| `PostToolUse` (Bash) | milestone-detector.sh | Detect milestones |
| `PreCompact` | compact-instructions.sh | Inject preservation guidance |
| `Stop` | stop-check.sh | Check context health before stopping |

## Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `strategic-compact` | Context management guidance and recommendations |

## Compaction Commands

| Command | Use When |
|---------|----------|
| `/compact` | Quick context reset, keep working |
| `/compact Focus on API changes` | Custom summarization focus |
| `/clear` | Complete reset for new task |

## File Structure

```
strategic-compact/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json
├── hooks/
│   └── hooks.json
├── scripts/
│   ├── session-init.sh
│   ├── track-and-suggest.sh
│   ├── milestone-detector.sh
│   ├── compact-instructions.sh
│   └── stop-check.sh
├── skills/
│   └── strategic-compact/
│       └── SKILL.md
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)
files.serena-integration/README.md:
# Serena Integration

Full-automation Serena MCP integration for Claude Code. Semantic navigation, automatic memory suggestions, and intelligent tool routing work transparently.

## Overview

This plugin enhances Claude Code with Serena MCP capabilities, providing automatic suggestions for semantic code navigation, memory management, and context preservation.

## Features

- **Automatic Tool Suggestions**: Context-aware recommendations for Serena's semantic tools
- **Memory Management**: Prompts to update memory after commits, tests, and discoveries
- **Session Tracking**: Tracks edits, commits, tests for session summaries
- **Context Preservation**: Saves context before compaction
- **Subagent Support**: Provides context to subagents, captures findings

## Prerequisites

Before installing this plugin, set up Serena MCP in your project.

### Step 1: Add Serena MCP Server

```bash
cd /path/to/your/project

claude mcp add serena -- uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena start-mcp-server --context claude-code --project $(pwd)
```

### Step 2: Create Project Configuration

```bash
# Auto-detect language
uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena project create

# Or specify manually
uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena project create --language python
```

### Step 3: Index Project (Large projects)

```bash
uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena project index
```

### Step 4: Configure Excluded Tools

Edit `.serena/project.yml`:

```yaml
project_name: my_project
language: python

excluded_tools:
  - think_about_collected_information
  - think_about_task_adherence
  - think_about_whether_you_are_done
  - execute_shell_command
```

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin add anilcancakir/serena-integration
```

## Hooks

| Event | Script | Purpose |
|-------|--------|---------|
| `SessionStart` | session-init.sh | Initialize session, provide Serena guidance |
| `PreToolUse` (Read) | suggest-semantic-read.sh | Suggest `get_symbols_overview` for large files |
| `PreToolUse` (Grep\|Glob) | suggest-semantic-search.sh | Suggest `find_symbol` for symbol searches |
| `PreToolUse` (Edit\|Write) | track-edits.sh | Track file modifications |
| `PostToolUse` (Bash) | memory-on-commit.sh | Suggest memory update after commits |
| `PostToolUse` (Bash) | memory-on-test.sh | Suggest memory update after test failures |
| `PostToolUse` (mcp__serena__*) | track-serena-usage.sh | Track Serena tool usage |
| `UserPromptSubmit` | inject-context.sh | Inject relevant context |
| `Stop` | session-summary.sh | Generate session summary |
| `PreCompact` | preserve-for-compact.sh | Save context before compaction |
| `SubagentStart` | agent-context.sh | Provide context to subagents |
| `SubagentStop` | agent-findings.sh | Capture subagent findings |
| `SessionEnd` | (cleanup) | Remove temp files |

## Skills

| Skill | Triggers | Description |
|-------|----------|-------------|
| `/serena-navigator` | "navigate code", "find definition" | Semantic code navigation |
| `/serena-refactor` | "rename function", "refactor" | Safe refactoring operations |
| `/serena-memory` | "save context", "load memories" | Memory management |

## Serena Tools Quick Reference

### Navigation
- `get_symbols_overview(file)` - See file structure
- `find_symbol(name)` - Find definition
- `find_referencing_symbols(name)` - Find all usages

### Refactoring
- `rename_symbol(old, new)` - Rename across codebase
- `replace_symbol_body(name, body)` - Replace function body

### Memory
- `list_memories()` - See all memories
- `read_memory(key)` - Load memory
- `write_memory(key, content)` - Save memory

## Troubleshooting

| Issue | Solution |
|-------|----------|
| Serena tools not available | Verify: `claude mcp list` |
| Thinking loops | Check excluded_tools in project.yml |
| No memories | Run `check_onboarding_performed()` then `onboarding()` |
| Missing symbols | Run `restart_language_server()` |

## File Structure

```
serena-integration/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json
├── hooks/
│   └── hooks.json
├── scripts/
│   ├── session-init.sh
│   ├── suggest-semantic-read.sh
│   ├── suggest-semantic-search.sh
│   ├── track-edits.sh
│   ├── memory-on-commit.sh
│   ├── memory-on-test.sh
│   ├── track-serena-usage.sh
│   ├── inject-context.sh
│   ├── session-summary.sh
│   ├── preserve-for-compact.sh
│   ├── agent-context.sh
│   └── agent-findings.sh
├── skills/
│   ├── serena-navigator/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   ├── serena-refactor/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   └── serena-memory/
│       └── SKILL.md
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## Requirements

- Serena MCP server configured
- `jq` command-line tool

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)
files.dart-lsp/README.md:
# Dart LSP

Dart/Flutter language server plugin for Claude Code. Provides code intelligence features including go-to-definition, find references, hover information, and code analysis.

## Overview

This plugin integrates the Dart language server with Claude Code, enabling enhanced code intelligence for Dart and Flutter projects.

## Features

- **Go-to-Definition**: Jump to symbol definitions
- **Find References**: Locate all usages of a symbol
- **Hover Information**: View type information and documentation
- **Code Analysis**: Real-time error and warning detection
- **Completions**: Intelligent code completions

## Supported Extensions

- `.dart`

## Prerequisites

The Dart language server is included with the Dart SDK. Ensure you have Dart or Flutter installed.

### Dart SDK

```bash
# macOS (Homebrew)
brew tap dart-lang/dart
brew install dart

# Windows (Chocolatey)
choco install dart-sdk

# Linux (apt)
sudo apt-get install dart
```

### Flutter SDK (includes Dart)

```bash
# macOS (Homebrew)
brew install flutter

# Or download from https://flutter.dev/docs/get-started/install
```

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin add anilcancakir/dart-lsp
```

## Verification

Verify the language server is available:

```bash
dart language-server --help
```

## File Structure

```
dart-lsp/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## References

- [Dart SDK](https://dart.dev/get-dart)
- [Flutter SDK](https://flutter.dev/docs/get-started/install)
- [Dart Language Server Protocol](https://github.com/dart-lang/sdk/tree/main/pkg/analysis_server)

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)
files.pre-commit-flow/README.md:
# Pre-Commit Flow

Pre-commit quality assurance workflow for Claude Code. Automates code review, documentation updates, and smart commits with stack-specific intelligence.

## Overview

This plugin provides a complete pre-commit workflow with automated code review, documentation updates, and intelligent commit message generation.

## Features

- **Code Review**: Security analysis, bug detection, quality checks
- **Documentation**: Auto-update inline docs and project documentation
- **Smart Commits**: Auto-detect commit style, generate semantic messages
- **Full Workflow**: Run all phases in sequence with state tracking

## Supported Stacks

| Stack | Code Review | Docs | Tests |
|-------|-------------|------|-------|
| Laravel | OWASP, SQL injection, CSRF, mass assignment | PHPDoc | Pest, PHPUnit |
| Flutter | Null safety, secure storage, platform channels | DartDoc | flutter_test |
| Vue 2/3 | XSS, reactive exposure, SSR issues | JSDoc/VueDoc | Jest, Vitest |
| Nuxt.js | SSR data leaks, asyncData issues | JSDoc | Jest, Vitest |
| TailwindCSS | Class optimization | - | - |
| Alpine.js | x-html XSS, eval risks | JSDoc | - |

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin add anilcancakir/pre-commit-flow
```

## Commands

### /my_review - Code Review

```bash
/my_review                  # Full review + tests + auto-fix
/my_review --code-only      # Skip test analysis
/my_review --security-only  # Security issues only
/my_review --auto-fix       # Auto-fix simple issues
```

### /my_docs - Documentation

```bash
/my_docs                    # Update inline + /docs folder
/my_docs --inline-only      # Inline docs only
/my_docs --folder-only      # /docs folder only
/my_docs --check-only       # Report without changes
```

### /my_commit - Smart Commit

```bash
/my_commit                  # Generate commit message
/my_commit "fix: resolve bug"  # Use provided message
/my_commit --amend          # Amend previous commit
```

### /my_send - Full Workflow

```bash
/my_send                    # Full workflow
/my_send --skip-review      # Skip code review
/my_send --skip-docs        # Skip documentation
/my_send --quick            # Minimal checks
```

## Workflow

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    /my_send Workflow                    │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  ┌─────────┐     ┌─────────┐     ┌─────────┐           │
│  │ Review  │────►│  Docs   │────►│ Commit  │────►Push  │
│  │ (Opus)  │     │(Haiku)  │     │         │           │
│  └─────────┘     └─────────┘     └─────────┘           │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## Agents

| Agent | Model | Purpose |
|-------|-------|---------|
| `code-reviewer` | Opus | Deep security analysis, complex bug detection |
| `doc-updater` | Haiku | Fast documentation updates |
| `test-checker` | Sonnet | Test coverage analysis |

## Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `review-changes` | Code review methodology |
| `update-docs` | Documentation update patterns |
| `commit-changes` | Commit message generation |

## Hooks

| Event | Script | Purpose |
|-------|--------|---------|
| `SessionStart` | detect-project-config.sh | Detect project stack and configuration |
| `UserPromptSubmit` | git-status-context.sh | Show git status context |

## Auto-Fix Behavior

**Automatically fixed:**
- Missing null checks
- Obvious type coercion bugs
- Missing CSRF tokens
- Unescaped output

**Requires user input:**
- Architectural changes
- Business logic decisions
- Multiple valid solutions

## Commit Style Detection

| Style | Pattern | Example |
|-------|---------|---------|
| Conventional | `type(scope): msg` | `feat(auth): add login` |
| Gitmoji | `:emoji: msg` | `:sparkles: Add login` |
| Simple | Plain text | `Add login` |

## File Structure

```
pre-commit-flow/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json
├── hooks/
│   └── hooks.json
├── scripts/
│   ├── detect-project-config.sh
│   ├── git-status-context.sh
│   ├── detect-commit-style.sh
│   └── workflow-state.sh
├── agents/
│   ├── code-reviewer.md
│   ├── doc-updater.md
│   └── test-checker.md
├── skills/
│   ├── review-changes/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   ├── update-docs/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   └── commit-changes/
│       └── SKILL.md
├── commands/
│   ├── my_review.md
│   ├── my_docs.md
│   ├── my_commit.md
│   └── my_send.md
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)
files.idea-research/README.md:
# Idea Research

Comprehensive business research, market analysis, competitor intelligence, and idea validation plugin for Claude Code.

## Overview

This plugin provides structured research capabilities for validating business ideas, analyzing markets, and gathering competitive intelligence.

## Features

- **Market Analysis**: TAM/SAM/SOM calculation, industry dynamics, Porter's Five Forces
- **Competitor Intelligence**: Detailed profiles, positioning analysis, gap identification
- **Trend Analysis**: Signal detection, timing assessment, lifecycle mapping
- **Idea Validation**: 5-dimension scoring framework, SWOT analysis, go/no-go recommendations

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin add anilcancakir/idea-research
```

## Commands

### /my_research

```bash
# Quick market overview
/my_research "AI code review tools" --quick

# Standard competitor analysis
/my_research "Notion alternatives" --standard

# Deep idea validation
/my_research "SaaS for developer analytics" --deep
```

## Research Modes

| Mode | Duration | Best For |
|------|----------|----------|
| `--quick` | ~15-20 min | Initial screening, quick decisions |
| `--standard` | ~30-45 min | Informed decisions, pitch prep |
| `--deep` | ~60+ min | Critical decisions, investment validation |

## Agents

| Agent | Model | Purpose |
|-------|-------|---------|
| `market-researcher` | Opus | Deep market sizing, industry analysis |
| `idea-validator` | Opus | Business idea scoring, validation |
| `trend-analyzer` | Sonnet | Timing assessment, signal detection |

## Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `research` | Core research methodology and frameworks |

## Research Frameworks

### Market Sizing (TAM/SAM/SOM)

- Top-down approach using industry reports
- Bottom-up approach using customer counts
- Value theory approach using problem cost

### Competitive Analysis

- 3-tier competitor classification
- Feature comparison matrices
- Positioning maps
- Gap analysis

### Idea Validation (5-Dimension Scoring)

| Dimension | Weight |
|-----------|--------|
| Problem-Solution Fit | 25% |
| Market Opportunity | 20% |
| Competitive Advantage | 20% |
| Founder-Market Fit | 20% |
| Execution Feasibility | 15% |

**Score Interpretation:**
- 8.0-10.0: **STRONG GO** - Pursue aggressively
- 6.0-7.9: **CONDITIONAL GO** - Pursue with improvements
- 4.0-5.9: **PIVOT REQUIRED** - Rethink assumptions
- 1.0-3.9: **NO GO** - Abandon or reconceptualize

## Output

Reports are saved to `.claude/research/`:

```
.claude/research/
├── ai-code-review-quick-2026-01-26.md
├── notion-alternatives-standard-2026-01-26.md
└── dev-analytics-deep-2026-01-26.md
```

## Examples

### Validate a Business Idea

```bash
/my_research "B2B SaaS for automated code documentation" --deep
```

Output includes:
- Market size (TAM/SAM/SOM)
- Competitive landscape (10+ competitors)
- Trend analysis with timing verdict
- 5-dimension validation score
- SWOT analysis
- Actionable next steps

### Analyze a Market

```bash
/my_research "developer tools market 2026" --standard
```

Output includes:
- Market sizing with sources
- Industry dynamics (growth drivers/inhibitors)
- Porter's Five Forces analysis
- Major trends and timing

### Quick Competitor Scan

```bash
/my_research "alternatives to Linear for project management" --quick
```

Output includes:
- Top 5 competitors with key metrics
- Positioning overview
- Quick gap analysis

## File Structure

```
idea-research/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json
├── agents/
│   ├── market-researcher.md
│   ├── idea-validator.md
│   └── trend-analyzer.md
├── skills/
│   └── research/
│       ├── SKILL.md
│       └── references/
│           ├── research-frameworks.md
│           ├── competitor-analysis-workflow.md
│           ├── data-sources.md
│           └── analysis-templates.md
├── commands/
│   └── my_research.md
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)
files.implementation-planner/README.md:
# Implementation Planner

Structured implementation planning, execution, and TDD workflow for Claude Code.

## Overview

This plugin provides a structured approach to feature implementation with detailed planning, execution tracking, and optional test-driven development enforcement.

## Features

- **Plan**: Create detailed, phased implementation plans with verification steps
- **Execute**: Follow plans precisely with progress tracking
- **TDD**: Enforce test-first development with RED-GREEN-REFACTOR discipline

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin add anilcancakir/implementation-planner
```

## Commands

### /my_plan - Create Implementation Plan

```bash
/my_plan add user authentication with JWT
/my_plan --tdd implement order management system
```

**Options:**
- `--tdd` - Include TDD structure in each task

**Output:** Creates plan file at `.claude/plans/{timestamp}-{slug}.md`

### /my_execute - Execute Plan

```bash
/my_execute                              # List and select plan
/my_execute 20260126-143000-auth.md      # Execute specific plan
/my_execute --tdd auth.md                # Force TDD mode
```

**Features:**
- Executes tasks in order
- Runs verification after each task
- Updates progress in plan file
- Asks at phase transitions

### /my_tdd - Direct TDD Workflow

```bash
/my_tdd user login endpoint
/my_tdd shopping cart add item
```

**Workflow:**
1. Write failing test (RED)
2. Write minimal implementation (GREEN)
3. Improve code (REFACTOR)
4. Repeat

## Workflow

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    Implementation Planner               │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                         │
│  Large Feature:                                         │
│  ┌──────────┐     ┌──────────┐     ┌──────────┐        │
│  │ /my_plan │ ──► │  Review  │ ──► │/my_execute│        │
│  │  (Opus)  │     │ & Approve│     │ (Sonnet)  │        │
│  └──────────┘     └──────────┘     └──────────┘        │
│                                                         │
│  Small Feature:                                         │
│  ┌──────────┐     ┌─────────────┐                      │
│  │ /my_tdd  │ ──► │ RED-GREEN-  │                      │
│  │ (Sonnet) │     │  REFACTOR   │                      │
│  └──────────┘     └─────────────┘                      │
│                                                         │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## Agents

| Agent | Model | Purpose |
|-------|-------|---------|
| `planner` | Opus | Complex architectural reasoning |
| `executor` | Sonnet | Efficient multi-file implementation |
| `tdd-enforcer` | Sonnet | Test writing and execution |

## Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `plan` | Implementation planning methodology |
| `execute` | Plan execution and verification |
| `tdd` | Test-driven development patterns |

## Hooks

| Event | Script | Purpose |
|-------|--------|---------|
| `SessionStart` | detect-context.sh | Detect TDD mode, stack, Serena availability |

## Supported Stacks

### Laravel
- PHPUnit and Pest testing frameworks
- Feature and Unit test patterns
- Service-Repository architecture support

### Flutter
- flutter_test framework
- Unit, Widget, and Integration tests
- State management patterns

### Vue/Nuxt
- Vitest and Jest frameworks
- Composition API patterns
- Pinia store testing

## Plan File Format

```markdown
---
feature: User Authentication
status: draft | approved | in_progress | completed
created: 2026-01-26T14:30:00Z
tdd: true | false
stack: laravel | flutter | vue
---

# User Authentication Implementation Plan

## Overview
Brief description of what will be built.

## Phase 1: Setup
### Task 1.1: Install Dependencies
- **File**: composer.json
- **Action**: Run
- **Verification**: `composer show tymon/jwt-auth`
- **Status**: pending

## Phase 2: Implementation
### Task 2.1: Create AuthController
- **File**: app/Http/Controllers/AuthController.php
- **Action**: Create
- **TDD**:
  - **RED**: tests/Feature/AuthTest.php
  - **GREEN**: Minimal implementation
  - **REFACTOR**: Extract to service
- **Verification**: `php artisan test --filter=AuthTest`
- **Status**: pending
```

## Configuration

### Project-Level TDD

Add to `CLAUDE.md`:

```markdown
## Development Mode

TDD is enabled by default for this project.
```

### Plan Storage

Plans are stored in `.claude/plans/`.

## When to Plan vs Direct TDD

| Situation | Approach |
|-----------|----------|
| New feature spanning multiple files | `/my_plan` |
| Complex architecture decision | `/my_plan` (Opus reasoning) |
| Single endpoint/component | `/my_tdd` |
| Bug fix | `/my_tdd` or direct fix |
| Refactoring | `/my_tdd` (ensure test coverage first) |

## File Structure

```
implementation-planner/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json
├── hooks/
│   └── hooks.json
├── scripts/
│   └── detect-context.sh
├── agents/
│   ├── planner.md
│   ├── executor.md
│   └── tdd-enforcer.md
├── skills/
│   ├── plan/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   ├── execute/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   └── tdd/
│       └── SKILL.md
├── commands/
│   ├── my_plan.md
│   ├── my_execute.md
│   └── my_tdd.md
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)
files.project-optimizer/README.md:
# Project Optimizer

Optimize existing projects for Claude Code with intelligent project briefs, brand guidelines, and CLAUDE.md generation.

## Overview

This plugin creates structured documentation for any project: non-technical project briefs, platform-agnostic brand guidelines, and optimized Claude Code configuration.

## Features

- **Project Brief Generation**: Create non-technical project.md with identity, problem, audience, and features
- **Brand Guidelines**: Platform-agnostic brand.md with 12 Jungian archetypes, colors, typography, voice
- **CLAUDE.md Generation**: Technical Claude Code configuration using project.md and brand.md context
- **Audit**: Quality assessment with improvement recommendations

## Supported Stacks

| Stack | Detection | Optimization |
|-------|-----------|--------------|
| Laravel | composer.json, artisan | Full |
| Flutter | pubspec.yaml | Full |
| Vue 3 | package.json + vite.config | Full |
| Vue 2 / Nuxt 2 | package.json + nuxt.config | Full |
| TailwindCSS | tailwind.config.* | Full |
| Alpine.js | package.json | Full |
| Node.js | package.json | Standard |
| Python | requirements.txt / pyproject.toml | Standard |
| Go | go.mod | Standard |
| Rust | Cargo.toml | Standard |

## Installation

```bash
claude plugin add anilcancakir/project-optimizer
```

## Commands

| Command | Description | Output |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| `/my_project` | Interactive project brief creation | project.md |
| `/my_brand` | Interactive brand identity creation | brand.md |
| `/my_setup` | Claude Code configuration using context | CLAUDE.md |
| `/my_audit` | Audit all setup files with quality report | Report |

## Recommended Workflow

```
/my_project     # Step 1: Define WHAT the project is
    │
    ▼           Creates project.md (project brief)
    │
/my_brand       # Step 2: Define project IDENTITY
    │
    ▼           Creates brand.md (brand guidelines)
    │
/my_setup       # Step 3: Configure HOW Claude works
                Creates CLAUDE.md (technical config)
```

## Document Separation

| Document | Content | Audience |
|----------|---------|----------|
| project.md | Project identity, problem, audience, features | Stakeholders, team |
| brand.md | Colors, typography, voice, archetype | Designers, marketing |
| CLAUDE.md | Commands, architecture, testing, tools | Claude Code |

## Agents

| Agent | Model | Purpose |
|-------|-------|---------|
| `project-analyzer` | Opus | Deep codebase analysis |
| `setup-generator` | Sonnet | CLAUDE.md generation |
| `brand-architect` | Sonnet | Brand identity creation |

## Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `project-docs` | Project brief and PRD patterns |
| `brand-guidelines` | Jungian archetype-based branding |
| `claude-setup` | CLAUDE.md generation patterns |

## /my_project Workflow

Creates a non-technical project brief:

1. **Project Discovery** - Detect existing name/description
2. **Interactive Identity** - Project name, tagline, description
3. **Problem & Solution** - Pain point, target audience, value proposition
4. **Core Features** - Features as user benefits
5. **Market Research** - Optional via idea-research plugin
6. **Success Metrics** - Leading/lagging indicators
7. **Generate project.md**

## /my_brand Workflow

Creates platform-agnostic brand guidelines:

1. **Context Discovery** - Check project.md for context
2. **Archetype Selection** - 12 Jungian archetypes (Primary 70% + Secondary 30%)
3. **Color Palette** - HEX values, 9-shade scale, WCAG compliant
4. **Typography** - Font names, type scale
5. **Voice & Tone** - Based on archetype
6. **Generate brand.md**

## /my_setup Workflow

Uses project.md and brand.md to create CLAUDE.md:

1. **Context Discovery** - Check project.md, brand.md, existing CLAUDE.md
2. **Extract Context** - Project identity, brand guidelines
3. **Stack Detection** - Laravel, Flutter, Vue, etc.
4. **Project Analysis** - Directory structure, architecture, testing
5. **Generate CLAUDE.md** - With references to project.md and brand.md
6. **Rules Generation** - Optional path-specific rules

## /my_audit Example

```
/my_audit --compact

PROJECT AUDIT SUMMARY
=====================
project.md:  [X] Found (85/100 B) | Good coverage
brand.md:    [ ] Missing         | Run /my_brand
CLAUDE.md:   [X] Found (72/100 C) | Missing: gotchas, brand ref
Grade: C (62/100) | Run: /my_brand, then /my_setup --full
```

## Token Budget Guidelines

| Project Size | CLAUDE.md Tokens | Max Lines |
|--------------|------------------|-----------|
| Small (<10k LOC) | 500-1000 | 50-100 |
| Medium (10-50k LOC) | 1000-2000 | 100-200 |
| Large (>50k LOC) | 2000-4000 | 200-300 |

## WCAG Color Compliance

`/my_brand` generates WCAG AA compliant color combinations:

| Usage | Min Contrast |
|-------|-------------|
| Body text | 4.5:1 |
| Large text (18px+) | 3:1 |
| UI components | 3:1 |

## File Structure

```
project-optimizer/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json
├── agents/
│   ├── project-analyzer.md
│   ├── setup-generator.md
│   └── brand-architect.md
├── skills/
│   ├── project-docs/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   ├── brand-guidelines/
│   │   └── SKILL.md
│   └── claude-setup/
│       ├── SKILL.md
│       └── references/
│           └── model-selection.md
├── commands/
│   ├── my_project.md
│   ├── my_brand.md
│   ├── my_setup.md
│   └── my_audit.md
├── README.md
├── CHANGELOG.md
└── LICENSE
```

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Author

**Anilcan Cakir** - [@anilcancakir](https://github.com/anilcancakir)

plugins.name: strategic-compact
plugins.description: Smart context management plugin. Suggests manual compaction at strategic points (phase transitions, milestones) instead of arbitrary auto-compact. Tracks tool usage, monitors context health, and provides intelligent recommendations.

plugins.name: serena-integration
plugins.description: Full-automation Serena MCP integration for Claude Code. Zero manual configuration - semantic navigation, automatic memory management, and intelligent tool routing work transparently.

plugins.name: dart-lsp
plugins.description: Dart/Flutter language server for enhanced code intelligence including go-to-definition, find references, hover information, and code analysis.

plugins.name: pre-commit-flow
plugins.description: Pre-commit quality assurance workflow with code review, documentation updates, and smart commits. Supports Laravel, Flutter, Vue 2/3, TailwindCSS, and Alpine.js.

plugins.name: idea-research
plugins.description: Comprehensive business research, market analysis, competitor intelligence, and idea validation. Features TAM/SAM/SOM calculation, Porter's Five Forces, SWOT analysis, and 5-dimension idea validation scoring.

plugins.name: implementation-planner
plugins.description: Structured implementation planning, execution, and TDD workflow. Create plans with Opus, execute with Sonnet, enforce RED-GREEN-REFACTOR discipline. Supports Laravel, Flutter, Vue/Nuxt with stack-specific testing patterns.

plugins.name: project-optimizer
plugins.description: Create project.md (PRD), brand.md (brand guidelines), and CLAUDE.md (technical config) for any project. Interactive workflow with audit, archetype-based branding, and stack-specific optimization.
